title: Can I get the CS1 fonts off of the CDs without installing?
content:
Is there some way I can get the Adobe Creative Suite 1 fonts off of the CDs (Mac version) without installing? IIRC there’s some good stuff on there that wasn’t in CS2 or 3 but I’m trying to avoid finding a machine to install it on just to get the fonts.

 [‹ Combining TT fonts into OTF](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012174037/http:/typophile.com/node/43324 "Go to previous forum topic") [Vertical Metrics Best Practice ? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012174037/http:/typophile.com/node/43371 "Go to next forum topic")
author: James Puckett

comments.content:
I bought CS on CDs, and the fonts are in a folder name “Goodies”.  
Ain’t that a fact.
